member_organisations:
DTP is an informal collaborative partnership that includes a variety of members including startups, corporate bodies, European associations, and a public relations consultancy. Its members are: 
 
Blue Ocean Robotics 
Brain + 
Burson-Marsteller 
Byteflies 
European Brain Council 
European Health Management Association 
MSD 
Well IT
head_office_address: MSD Europe Inc. Lynx Binnenhof, 5 Clos du Lynx
eu_initiatives:
We share innovative case studies in a wide range of fields across the digital health spectrum and entrepreneurial perspectives, to inform of the challenges and actively remove barriers faced by our partners on a day-to-day basis, in terms of policies and regulations and help change these into opportunities. 
 
Key policy areas: 
●    ePrivacy 
 
●    Free flow of non-personal data 
 
●    Electronic health records 
 
●    Data protection regulation 
 
●    Copyright 
 
●    Product Liability and Machine Learning 
 
●    Medical Devices CE Marking
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Digital Therapeutics Partnership (DTP) brings together a unique alliance that covers the full spectrum of digital healthcare – including global companies, startups, healthcare institutions, academic research consortia and patient groups.  
 
Our mission is to help create the healthcare of tomorrow through the transformational power of digital technologies with the view to improving people’s lives, enhancing health outcomes, and increasing efficiencies in healthcare systems.  
 
To do so we aim at partnering with all relevant actors including public institutions and decision-makers to build an enabling policy environment for digital healthcare that will allow solutions and technologies to be developed, deployed, grown in Europe, and ultimately benefit patients and citizens.
